title: Connectivity, Flexibility and Integration in the Automated Lab - Technology Networks
summary: Agilent is developing automated laboratory solutions that streamline workflows for scientists, enabling them to focus on research and analysis. Their new NGS Bravo platform with on-deck thermal cycling extends walk-away time, enhancing efficiency and productivity. The company also emphasizes sustainability by partnering with My Green Lab and committing to net-zero emissions by 2050.
